## Description {#details}

Tagged DWARF-like metadata node.

A metadata node with a DWARF tag (i.e., a constant named <code>DW&#95;TAG&#95;&#42;</code>, defined in <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/binaryformat/dwarf-h">llvm/BinaryFormat/Dwarf.h</a>). Called <em><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dinode">DINode</a></em> because it&#39;s potentially used for non-DWARF output.

Uses the SubclassData16 <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/metadata">Metadata</a> slot.

Definition at line 135 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/debuginfometadata-h">DebugInfoMetadata.h</a>.

## Enumerations

### enum  {#aded082f50ef7ec8cbcd27f2b0dec28a9}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>enum llvm::DINode::DIFlags : uint32&#95;t</>}>
Debug info flags.

<EnumerationList title="Enumeration values">

<Link id="aded082f50ef7ec8cbcd27f2b0dec28a9a30b209e4417da06657aed5dc140e0127" />
<EnumerationListItem name="FlagAccessibility">
 (= FlagPrivate | FlagProtected | FlagPublic)
</EnumerationListItem>

<Link id="aded082f50ef7ec8cbcd27f2b0dec28a9a08f7771d442a9ba588fabbf78be12c87" />
<EnumerationListItem name="FlagPtrToMemberRep">
 (= FlagSingleInheritance | FlagMultipleInheritance |
                         FlagVirtualInheritance)
</EnumerationListItem>

</EnumerationList>

The three accessibility flags are mutually exclusive and rolled together in the first two bits.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/debuginfometadata-h/#l00174">174</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/debuginfometadata-h">DebugInfoMetadata.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### splitFlags() {#a63a4694d7a6c8da554e27cf83c212670}

<MemberDefinition

  labels = {["static"]}>
Split up a flags bitfield.

Split <code>Flags</code> into <code>SplitFlags</code>, a vector of its components. Returns any remaining (unrecognized) bits.
